message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.CC 

This paper deals with the problem of stochastic combinatorial multi-armed bandit (CMAB) with a general nonlinear reward function, which is a topic that falls under the broad area of machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The paper also proposes a new algorithm for estimating the distributions of underlying random variables, which involves techniques from probability and statistics (cs.DS). The problem of expected utility maximization is also discussed, which is related to game theory (cs.GT) and optimization (cs.CC).
